name: Les Aventures du Ka: Traitement Bzzz
overview: How to eliminate the too brilliant special agent Karl ADRIX, nicknamed the "KA"? For the enemy powers only one solution: The BZZZ treatment or how to get rid of a champion while taking a radical revenge on him! Will the "KA" succeed the impossible bet? That of surviving in a relentless natural environment I named: the cruel and nightmarish world of insects!
